Articles.Content:
I keep getting the 'missing parachute' warning dispite having parachutes ([screeny](http://images.akamai.steamusercontent.com/ugc/532892705164253674/EA6E7B3722839FFCF91FF93C796485D32E6D5C21/)

Am I missing something? It's not a big deal, but it is confusing

Possibly because of your radially attached boosters? The extended physics bubble now means it's possible to chute them up and have them fall safely down for recovery. It might be that, does clicking to expand it out give you any more info?
Are you using realchute? I have noticed the same warning message after I installed it. I would probably post the same bug report in the mod's thread so it can get fixed.

> 
> Possibly because of your radially attached boosters? The extended physics bubble now means it's possible to chute them up and have them fall safely down for recovery. It might be that, does clicking to expand it out give you any more info?

It also happends when it's ONLY a pod and parachute

> 
> Are you using realchute? I have noticed the same warning message after I installed it. I would probably post the same bug report in the mod's thread so it can get fixed.

I am, that might be it
